title: Nest Library Options Schema
description: Generates a new Nest (NestJS) library in the workspace.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the Nest library?

directory.description: The directory of the new application.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

skipPackageJson.description: Do not add dependencies to package.json.

skipTsConfig.description: Do not update tsconfig.base.json for development experience.

unitTestRunner.description: Adds the specified unit test runner

testEnvironment.description: The test environment to use if unitTestRunner is set to jest

target.description: The es target, Nest suggest using es6 or higher.
